createslf 0.0.0.9000

Reference

All functions

boxi_date_format()

The standard BOXI date format

date_to_numeric()

Convert a date type to the 'SLF numeric format'

dd_period()

Get the Delayed Discharge period

eng_gp_to_dummy()

Convert English GP practice codes to a dummy code

extract_path()

Get BOXI extract

get_file_path()

Get and check and full file path

get_it_deaths_path()

Get the full path to the IT Deaths extract

get_it_ltc_path()

Get the full path to the IT Long Term Conditions extract

get_it_prescribing_path()

Get the full path to the IT PIS extract

get_lookups_dir()

Get the path to the lookups directory

get_slf_dir()

General SLF directory for accessing HSCDIIP folders/files

it_extract_ref()

Get the IT extract ref number

latest_update()

Get the latest update

numeric_to_date()

Convert a date in 'SLF numeric format' to Date type

previous_update()

Get the previous update

read_anon_to_chi()

Read the Anon to CHI lookup

read_chi_to_anon()

Read the CHI to Anon lookup

read_cohorts_dir()

Function for cohorts directory - Demographic cohorts and Service Use cohorts

read_costs_dir()

Function for costs directory - Reading CH, DN and GP OOH costs

read_datazone_pop_file()

Read the Datazone populations

read_dd_file()

Function for delayed discharges directory

read_deaths_dir()

Get the deaths file directory

read_hhg_dir()

Function for HHG directory - reading HHG extract

read_locality_file()

Read the locality file

read_lookups_dir()

Function for lookups directory - source postcode and gpprac lookup

read_ltc_dir()

Function for LTCs directory - stores LTC extracts for all years

read_nsu_dir()

Function for NSU directory - stores NSU extracts for years that are available

read_practice_details()

Function for reading in GP cluster lookup "Practice Details" for creating source GP prac lookup above

read_simd_file()

Read the Scottish Index for Multiple Deprivation (SIMD)

read_sparra_dir()

Function for SPARRA directory - reading SPARRA extract

read_spd_file()

Read the Scottish Postcode Directory file
